qwoptics_domain_example

Domain-specific example solving actual quantum wire physics problems.

This example demonstrates: 1. Quantum wire optical response to femtosecond laser pulses 2. Coherent control of electron-hole pairs 3. Analysis of optical nonlinearities and dephasing 4. Comparison with theoretical predictions

Purpose: Solve actual scientific problem with physical context Style: Connect code parameters to domain knowledge, interpret results Audience: Domain expert validating methodology
